text:
Hey guys,
Is someone using <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/8105018/marketplace/apps/marketing/analytics-data/tableau|Tableau Integration> by <http://datawarehouse.io|datawarehouse.io>? I have a couple of quick questions and would love to talk to someone using this tool :)

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.

Hi, I wonder if we can add a form submission preview confirmation pop-up window when a contact clicks submit and then add another button inside the pop-up that actually submits the data once it’s been reviewed.

Has any of you worked on something similar?

Hello,

I am updating my app's scopes per a recent email regarding the `contacts` scope. That email states HubSpot will deprecate the `contacts` scope in favor of more granular scopes.

Right now, if I replace the `contacts` scope with the generated scopes from the "Install Url (OAuth)" section, I see the following error when attempting to authenticate:

```Insufficient scopes were provided. Please contact the app developer.```
However, if I include the `contacts` scope along with my granular `crm.` scopes then I can authenticate.

Is it ok to leave the `contacts` scope in place? Or if I leave it in place, will authentication break when HubSpot deprecates the `contacts` scope?

Hi,
I have a integration issue about timeline.
just created a HubSpot timeline event assciated a contact by email.  but I can not find it in this contact page.
the timeline event created successfully after checked it by api.

so anything I missed? or where I can find the timeline event
